推动，发动（机器等）；驾驶（马车，汽车等）；驱赶
驾驶员；驱动程序；起子；传动器
畜群；牛群、羊群等；移动的人群或大批的东西

担任负责人；处于统领地位
驾驶学生；驱使学生；充满活力的学生
鲁莽驾驶指控；胡乱开车指控

bilingual.target: 粗心驾驶导致许多交通事故。

bilingual.source: Drivers should carry a current driving licence.
bilingual.target: 司机应携带有效的驾驶执照。
他的驾驶考试不及格了。
她因为鲁莽驾驶而被罚款。
他的驾驶执照被悬浮了。

bilingual.source: The defogger is essential for safe driving in foggy conditions.
bilingual.target: 在雾天驾驶时，除雾器是安全驾驶的必需品。
超速驾驶是非常危险的。
他终于拿到了驾驶执照。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm glad. I guess you devised the fuzzy driving software for the T-Port? Yes. You are correct in your guess.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就好，我猜是你为便携科技设计了驾驶软件？是的，你猜得没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you know that Leonard has a perfect driving record and enjoys the insurance discounts that go along with that? Hubba-hubba.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道莱纳德的驾驶记录超完美，因此能享受到车险打折这件事吗？很棒吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I will demonstrate that I was improperly instructed in driving by a woman whose lack of respect for society borders on the sociopathic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要论证的是，我在驾驶过程中受到一个女人的误导，这个女人缺乏社会上对反社会界定的基本认识。

yingyinNormal.en: But if you believe that A.I. can transcend its creators' original mission, and you introduced the theory of fuzzy driving in order to make the car more aggressive, more human-like, then why couldn't the computer override your safety controls?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是如果你认为人工智能会超越创造者的初始任务并且你引入了模糊智能驾驶以使得车辆更加自主，更像人类，那为什么计算机不会重写安全控制模块呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, thank you for driving me home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那，谢谢你送我回家。

yingyinNormal.en: Doc, hold it! Seriously, your driving's incredible!
yingyinNormal.zh: 韩大夫，你的技术真是太棒了！

yingyinNormal.en: No, but I don't need the contact lenses for driving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 开车时我不需要戴近视眼镜。

yingyinNormal.en: Rose cries all day, every day. It's driving me crazy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 萝丝整天哭，没日没夜我快崩溃了。

yingyinNormal.en: I drove, Mother. I'm driving now. Yes, dear. Mommy's proud.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是我开的车，妈妈，现在也是我在开。没错，宝贝，你真是妈妈的骄傲。

yingyinNormal.en: Driving in Italy is very different to driving at home. Hello. Yes, we are on a holiday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在意大利开车和在国内开车非常不一样。你好！是的，我们在度假。

yingyinNormal.en: Driving in Italy is very different to driving at home. Hello. Yes, we are on a holiday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在意大利开车和在国内开车非常不一样。你好！是的，我们在度假。

yingyinNormal.en: Was I... Excuse me? Were you texting on the night of the accident while driving? I... not while driving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我，你说什么事？发那晚，你是不是边开车边发短信了？没有开车时发短信。

yingyinNormal.en: So am I driving you to work or are you still mad at me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么今早是我送你去上班还是说仍旧对我生气?

yingyinNormal.en: Remember Daddy Pig, this is another country. They may drive differently here. Driving is driving, Mummy Pig. It can't be that different?
yingyinNormal.zh: 记住，猪爸爸，这是另一个国家。他们可能开车的方式不同。开车就是开车，猪妈妈，这能有多难？

yingyinNormal.en: Remember Daddy Pig, this is another country. They may drive differently here. Driving is driving, Mummy Pig. It can't be that different?
yingyinNormal.zh: 记住，猪爸爸，这是另一个国家。他们可能开车的方式不同。开车就是开车，猪妈妈，这能有多难？

yingyinNormal.en: Grandpa Pig is driving his motor mower over to Peppa's house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爷爷开着自己的割草机到佩奇的家去了。

yingyinNormal.en: Today, Peppa and her family are driving out to the countryside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天佩奇和家人一起开车到郊外。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, it's simple. This was my idea. I'm driving. I'm Cinderella.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很简单，这是我的主意，开车的是我，所以我是灰姑娘。

yingyinNormal.en: Has he spoken yet, is he driving, does he have a favorite liqueur?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说话了吗？会开车了吗？他有偏好的甜酒吗？

yingyinNormal.en: They're driving right by. They don't even know what they're missing!
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们只是驶过这里，他们都不知道他们错过了什么

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 猛烈的；有巨大影响力的；掌握控制权的
n. 驾驶员；司机；传动装置；主动轮；推动力；球棒；驱赶某种动物的人；激励器；驱动程序

word_family.mean: v. 驾车；开车；推动；驱动；赶；驱赶；迫使；逼迫；赶走；会开车

sense_info_list.en: the act of controlling and steering the movement of a vehicle or animal

examination_example.sentence: Their reactions may be a complex combination of instant reflexes, input from past <highlight>driving</highlight> experiences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的反应可能是来自过去驾驶经验和即时反应的复杂组合。

examination_example.sentence: To anticipate every imaginable <highlight>driving</highlight> situation is a difficult programming problem.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 预测每一种可以想象的驾驶情况是一个困难的编程问题。

examination_example.sentence: On these sorts of trips, it's easy to lose concentration on the <highlight>driving</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这类旅行中，很容易在开车时失去注意力。

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 猛烈的；有巨大影响力的；掌握控制权的
n. 驾驶员；司机；传动装置；主动轮；推动力；球棒；驱赶某种动物的人；激励器；驱动程序

word_family.mean: v. 驾车；开车；推动；驱动；赶；驱赶；迫使；逼迫；赶走；会开车

sense_info_list.en: the act of controlling and steering the movement of a vehicle or animal

examination_example.sentence: Boredom has been linked to behavior issues including inattentive <highlight>driving</highlight>, mindless snacking, excessive drinking, and addictive gambling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无聊与行为问题有关，包括粗心驾驶、盲目吃零食、过度饮酒和赌博成瘾。

examination_example.sentence: No crazy <highlight>driving</highlight>, no insults, no cutting in; traffic laws would be respected and <highlight>driving</highlight> much safer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有疯狂驾驶，没有侮辱，没有插队；交通法规将会得到尊重，驾驶也更加安全。

examination_example.sentence: You are not allowed to drive a car unsupervised until you have passed a <highlight>driving</highlight> test.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你通过驾驶考试之前，不允许在无人监督的情况下驾驶汽车。

sense_info_list.zh: 有巨大影响力的; 掌握控制权的

examination_example.sentence: The human thirst for knowledge is the <highlight>driving</highlight> force behind our successful development as a species.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类对知识的渴望是我们作为一个物种成功发展的驱动力。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>driving</highlight> force behind much of this change was a (n) innovation popularly known as the Internet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种变化背后的驱动力是一种被普遍称为互联网的创新。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 猛烈的；有巨大影响力的；掌握控制权的
n. 驾驶员；司机；传动装置；主动轮；推动力；球棒；驱赶某种动物的人；激励器；驱动程序

word_family.mean: v. 驾车；开车；推动；驱动；赶；驱赶；迫使；逼迫；赶走；会开车

sense_info_list.en: the act of controlling and steering the movement of a vehicle or animal

examination_example.sentence: The Newcastle team are developing in-vehicle technologies for older drivers which they hope could help them to continue <highlight>driving</highlight> into later life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纽卡斯尔团队正在为老年司机开发车载技术，他们希望这可以帮助他们在晚年继续驾驶。

examination_example.sentence: Research shows that giving up <highlight>driving</highlight> is one of the key reasons for a fall in health and well-being among older people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究表明，放弃驾驶是老年人健康和幸福感下降的关键原因之一。

examination_example.sentence: In the summer holiday following my eighteenth birthday, I took <highlight>driving</highlight> lessons.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我18岁生日后的暑假里，我上了驾驶课。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 汽车驾驶员行车执照考试

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 猛烈的；有巨大影响力的；掌握控制权的
n. 驾驶员；司机；传动装置；主动轮；推动力；球棒；驱赶某种动物的人；激励器；驱动程序

word_family.mean: v. 驾车；开车；推动；驱动；赶；驱赶；迫使；逼迫；赶走；会开车

examination_example.sentence: For example, the vocabulary for cars and <highlight>driving</highlight> is very different.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比如汽车和驾驶的词汇就很不一样。

examination_example.sentence: And they can go only 65 kilometers an hour, so <highlight>driving</highlight> will be safer, too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们每小时只能行驶65公里，所以开车也会更安全。

examination_example.sentence: The most attractive news about Alphaba is that its <highlight>driving</highlight> system is developed independently by Chinese designers and engineers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Alphaba最吸引人的消息是，它的驱动系统是由中国设计师和工程师独立研发的。
